record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 9:15 A.M. TOMORROW

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, if there is no further business to come before the Senate--and the Republican leader has cleared everything that I have done to this point--I ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 8:29 p.m., adjourned until Friday, March 9, 2007, at 9:15 a.m.
